faqs.question: Do I need planning permission for fireplace installation in Cardiff?
faqs.answer: Most fireplace installations in Cardiff don't require planning permission. However, if you live in a listed building or conservation area (such as parts of Pontcanna or Roath), you may need consent. We'll advise on requirements specific to your Cardiff property.
